[Home](https://www.ci.port-neches.tx.us/) [Government](https://www.ci.port-neches.tx.us/government/index.php) Mayor and City Council

City CouncilWelcome to Port Neches, Texas**“Sapphire City of the Neches”**  
  
Welcome to the official website of the City of Port Neches! As the Mayor of Port Neches, it is with great pleasure that I introduce you to our community. Port Neches is located in Southeast Texas alongside the scenic Neches River. Our bedroom community is the home of over 13,000 residents where we enjoy a small town atmosphere, close enough to the big cities to experience the advantages they can offer, without the hustle and bustle of big city living.  
  
                   ![robertarnold_ew](https://www.ci.port-neches.tx.us/Staff%20Photos/robertarnold_ew.jpg?t=202512181012550)                                                                                           ![Anders, Adam - 2024-01-23](https://www.ci.port-neches.tx.us/Anders,%20Adam%20-%202024-01-23.jpg?t=202401231740050)

Mayor of Port Neches                                               Councilmember, Place 1                                       Councilmember, Place 2

Southeast Texas Alerting Network STAN
-------------------------------------

  
  
  
  
  
  
STAN can call you at home, but it's important to register your cell phone too.
[Register ![](https://www.ci.port-neches.tx.us/_assets_/images/right-arrow-w.png)](http://thestan.com/register)
